ai-ja402:1.1_0: “One whose mind is full of light,
ai-ja402:1.2_0: Whether on their way to waves,
ai-ja402:1.4_0: May you be free of Brahmā!”
ai-ja402:2.1_0: “I’m a wife, sirs, that my wife should be like the young man,
ai-ja402:3.4_0: knowing the darkness, the darkness calls away,
ai-ja402:4.1_0: having taken a stick, and a wife,
ai-ja402:4.2_0: Seeing a Your body, a victor,
ai-ja402:4.4_0: can see this blessing, and the necklace.”
ai-ja402:5.1_0: The assembly, in the middle, and the assembly
ai-ja402:5.2_0: he released the Sattuka, he released the chapped.
ai-ja402:5.3_0: Then the rising of coils (only) approached the firey,
ai-ja402:6.1_0: “The people are satisfied with the king,
ai-ja402:6.2_0: He who sees well-kept in wisdom,
ai-ja402:6.4_0: by knowledge of this wisdom, brahmin, is it appropriate for you?”
ai-ja402:7.1_0: “There are these seventy-seven disciples of me.
ai-ja402:7.2_0: I give up all the virtuous things.
ai-ja402:7.3_0: You’ve gained the life of mine,
ai-ja402:8.3_0: Others should give away this spiritual life.
ai-ja402:9.1_0: the seventh Bodhi Tree is the seventh,
